content: <?xml version="1.0"?><OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">   <ShortName>W&M Libraries Catalog</ShortName>   <Description>Library Catalog Search</Description>   <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/png">http://catalog.libraries.wm.edu/themes/root/images/vufind-favicon.png</Image>   <Contact>libsys@wm.edu</Contact>   <Url type="text/html" method="get" template="http://catalog.libraries.wm.edu/Search/Results?lookfor={searchTerms}&page={startPage?}"/>   <Url type="application/rss+xml" method="get" template="http://catalog.libraries.wm.edu/Search/Results?lookfor={searchTerms}&view=rss"/>   <Url type="application/x-suggestions+json" method="get" template="http://catalog.libraries.wm.edu/Search/Suggest?lookfor={searchTerms}&format=JSON"/> </OpenSearchDescription>
